MS_MALDI.Name: 4800 MALDI-TOF-TOF ion source
MS_MALDI.Dissociation_Summary: Enhanced Post-source decay (PSD) For more information, look at the acquisition parameters file.
MS_MALDI.Oparameters:
Pulse rate up to 200 Hz with < 500 psec duration/pulse
Also look at acquisition parameters file

userParam.name: Used for generate peak lists from the 4800 ABI instrument that uses an Oracle database to store the MS spectra. This software extracts the data and packages it into a readable file format. The resulting data type is a .pkl file.

MS_DataAnalysis.Parameters: command-line parameters=msconvert --mzML -z -v -i contact_info.txt --filter 'peakPicking true 1-'msconvert --mzML -z -v -i contact_info.txt --filter 'peakPicking true 1-' ABI/DataExplorer peak picking command-line parameters=msconvert --mzML -z -v -i contact_info.txt --filter 'peakPicking true 1-'msconvert --mzML -z -v -i contact_info.txt --filter 'peakPicking true 1-'

userParam.name: Using the "Peaks to MASCOT" option, the software generates the peak list files from acquired spectra.

MS_DataAnalysis.Parameters: See next link to peaklist_generation_parameters.rar file. Contents of the file: - "Peaks_to_MASCOT_screenshoot.png": a screenshot of the GUI of the parameters - "Settings_Peaks to Mascot.ini": parameters file.

userParam.value: S. cerevisiae strain BY4741 (MATa, leu2Δ0, met15Δ0, ura3Δ0, his3Δ1) was grown in a 10-liter batch of rich (yeast extract peptone dextrose) medium at 30°C in a fermentor to an A600 of 0.93. After harvesting by continuous centrifugation, the cell pellet was washed three times with ice-cold water.
userParam.name: cell growth

userParam.value: The cells were lysed by incubation with 10% ice-cold trichloroacetic acid (v/v) final concentration for 1 h at 4°C. The protein precipitate was collected by centrifugation, washed twice with 90% ice-cold acetone, and pelleted again. The resulting material was aliquotted, lyophilized and stored at -80°C.
userParam.name: cell lysis and sample storage
